tronc: Yes, the company has an annoying lower-case name, even though it stands for "Tribune online content."
Um, did anyone at the company realize that it had already won dozens of Pulitzers over the years?
So instead of keeping a fabled media name — Tribune — the company unveiled tronc in 2016.
(As I write this, tronc's lead story is "What's Going On At UConn?
The company slogan is equally absurd: "From pixels to Pulitzers."
Juwan Durham Latest Husky To Say He's Leaving."
Yeah, that's how we win Pulitzers!)
